hadiths.text: Narrated Rafi' ibn Khadij: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If anyone sows in other people's land without their permission, he has no right to any of the crop, but he may have what it cost him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي زَرْعِ الأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ إِذْنِ صَاحِبِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Cultivating Land Without The Permission Of Its Owner
